title: 14 Day Ban
body: I have never received a chat restriction but I have been given a 14 day ban. I believe this was unfair as I have not been given a warning and as I understand then next punishment is a permanent ban. I was wondering if this is a mistake or that I will actually receive a permanent ban next even if I haven't been given any prior warning. I also don't believe I was in breach of the summoners code

replies.body:
Certain behaviors (typically hate speech, encouragements to self-harm, or extremely toxic behavior) can escalate immediately to a 14-day ban.

Can you share your chat logs? That will let us know more about the situation, and whether the immediate 14-day ban was justified (spoilers in advance -- mistakes in the system are exceptionally uncommon).

Isn't that a flawed system? All I did was joke around with my friends, which I understand the system doesn't take into context, and I get a 14 day ban without a chat restriction which would do the same thing as all I did was fuck around in chat

> I get a 14 day ban without a chat restriction which would do the same thing as all I did was fuck around in chat

If it was a full premade, then one of your friends probably didn't like it and reported you. If there were strangers in the chat, then your fcking around (whether directed at them or not) will certainly not help your case.

> I also don't believe I was in breach of the summoners code

So from you are saying, it seems like that you are fully aware that your "fcking around in chat" was a breach of the summoner's code. Your credibility is dropping here and chances are we'll label you as a liar.
